title: Prairie provinces of Canada
brief_description: A study of Manitoba, Alberta, and Saskatchewan, provinces which depend mainly on grain production for their prosperity, although mining and fur-farming are also important aspects of their economy. The processes involved in grain production, from planting to milling, are traced in detail.
description: A study of Manitoba, Alberta, and Saskatchewan, provinces which depend mainly on grain production for their prosperity, although mining and fur-farming are also important aspects of their economy.
